Advance gnuplot script

Exercise:
Script: open but do not modify ~/ost4sem/exercise/basic_adv_gnuplot/pol1m_gp1.sh and ~/ost4sem/exercise/basic_adv_gnuplot/pol2m_gp1.sh

  2. Do the same with avermonthnuts3.asc but before sampling the data with awk.
